languages.text: "Мы нуждаемся в путеводных камнях так же отчаянно, как тьма нуждается в свете звезд, а {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} — в глотке воздуха. И потому вынуждены скитаться по галактике в поисках старых миров, что подарили бы очередному миру-кораблю надежду на дальнейшее существование. Одно сердце мон-кай — одна ваша жизнь. Один путеводный камень — одна сохраненная душа Дитя Азуриана".

traits.locale_text: "Мы нуждаемся в путеводных камнях так же отчаянно, как тьма нуждается в свете звезд, а {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} — в глотке воздуха. И потому вынуждены скитаться по галактике в поисках старых миров, что подарили бы очередному миру-кораблю надежду на дальнейшее существование. Одно сердце мон-кай — одна ваша жизнь. Один путеводный камень — одна сохраненная душа Дитя Азуриана".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."
languages.original_text: "Мы нуждаемся в путеводных камнях так же отчаянно, как тьма нуждается в свете звезд, а {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}мон-кай{/g} — в глотке воздуха. И потому вынуждены скитаться по галактике в поисках старых миров, что подарили бы очередному миру-кораблю надежду на дальнейшее существование. Одно сердце мон-кай — одна ваша жизнь. Один путеводный камень — одна сохраненная душа Дитя Азуриана".

Each Waystone is a preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们迫切地需要引路石，就像黑暗迫切地需要星光，就像{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}迫切地需要空气一样急切。因此，我们只能在银河系中徘徊，寻找可能会有方舟世界存在的古老世界。每颗猴子的心脏，都代表你们之中某个鲜活的生命。而每块引路石，都代表阿苏焉的某位子嗣保存下来的灵魂。”
languages.original_text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: “我们迫切地需要引路石，就像黑暗迫切地需要星光，就像{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}猴子{/g}迫切地需要空气一样急切。因此，我们只能在银河系中徘徊，寻找可能会有方舟世界存在的古老世界。每颗猴子的心脏，都代表你们之中某个鲜活的生命。而每块引路石，都代表阿苏焉的某位子嗣保存下来的灵魂。”

languages.original_text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and mon-keigh need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

languages.text: «Necesitamos las piedras del alma con tanta desesperación como la oscuridad necesita la luz de las estrellas y los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, el aire. Así, estamos forzados a vagar por la galaxia en busca de los viejos mundos, que pueden dar a otro mundo astronave esperanzas de sobrevivir. Cada corazón mon-keigh es una de vuestras vidas. Cada piedra del alma es el alma conservada de un hijo de Asuryan».
languages.original_text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: «Necesitamos las piedras del alma con tanta desesperación como la oscuridad necesita la luz de las estrellas y los {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}, el aire. Así, estamos forzados a vagar por la galaxia en busca de los viejos mundos, que pueden dar a otro mundo astronave esperanzas de sobrevivir. Cada corazón mon-keigh es una de vuestras vidas. Cada piedra del alma es el alma conservada de un hijo de Asuryan».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「暗闇が星明りを、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}が空気を必要とするのと同じように、私たちには方位石が欠かすことができない。だから私たちは、他の方舟に生きる希望を与えてくれるかもしれない古い世界を求めて、銀河をさまようことにしたのだ。モン＝ケイの心臓はあなた方の命のひとつだ。同様に、方位石は、アシュリアンの御子らの、保存された魂なのだ」
languages.original_text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: 「暗闇が星明りを、{g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}モン＝ケイ{/g}が空気を必要とするのと同じように、私たちには方位石が欠かすことができない。だから私たちは、他の方舟に生きる希望を与えてくれるかもしれない古い世界を求めて、銀河をさまようことにしたのだ。モン＝ケイの心臓はあなた方の命のひとつだ。同様に、方位石は、アシュリアンの御子らの、保存された魂なのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wegsteine sind für uns so unverzichtbar wie die Dunkelheit für das Sternenlicht, wie die Luft für die {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}. Und so sind wir gezwungen, auf der Suche nach alten Welten durch die Galaxis zu irren, die vielleicht einem anderen Weltenschiff die Hoffnung auf eine Existenz bieten. Jedes Herz eines Chem-Pan-Sey ist eines Eurer Leben. Jeder Wegstein ist die konservierte Seele eines Kinds von Asuryan."
languages.original_text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: "Wegsteine sind für uns so unverzichtbar wie die Dunkelheit für das Sternenlicht, wie die Luft für die {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}Chem-Pan-Sey{/g}. Und so sind wir gezwungen, auf der Suche nach alten Welten durch die Galaxis zu irren, die vielleicht einem anderen Weltenschiff die Hoffnung auf eine Existenz bieten. Jedes Herz eines Chem-Pan-Sey ist eines Eurer Leben. Jeder Wegstein ist die konservierte Seele eines Kinds von Asuryan."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Comme les ténèbres ne peuvent exister sans lumière ou les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} sans air, nous ne pouvons pas nous passer des pierres gardiennes. Ainsi, nous sommes destinés à parcourir la galaxie à la recherche des mondes anciens, où pourrait résider l'espoir de la création d'un nouveau vaisseau-monde. Si le cœur d'un mon-keigh représente sa vie, chaque pierre gardienne est l'âme préservée d'un enfant d'Asuryan. »
languages.original_text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: « Comme les ténèbres ne peuvent exister sans lumière ou les {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} sans air, nous ne pouvons pas nous passer des pierres gardiennes. Ainsi, nous sommes destinés à parcourir la galaxie à la recherche des mondes anciens, où pourrait résider l'espoir de la création d'un nouveau vaisseau-monde. Si le cœur d'un mon-keigh représente sa vie, chaque pierre gardienne est l'âme préservée d'un enfant d'Asuryan. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nasıl ki karanlık yıldız, ışığına; {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keighler{/g} de havaya çaresizce ihtiyaç duyar, biz de yol taşlarına böyle ihtiyaç duyarız. Bundandır ki eski dünyaların peşine düşüp belki başka bir gemidünya keşfetmek umuduyla galaksiyi arşınlamaya mahkûmuz. Her mon-keigh'in yüreğinde bir hayat barınır. Her yol taşı ise bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nun ruhunu muhafaza eder."
languages.original_text: "We need waystones as desperately as darkness needs starlight and {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g} need air. And so we are bound to wander the galaxy in search of the old worlds that might give another craftworld hope for existence. Each mon-keigh's heart is one of your lives. Each waystone is the preserved soul of a Child of Asuryan."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl ki karanlık yıldız ışığına ve {g|Encyclopedia:MonKeigh}mon-keigh{/g}ler havaya çaresizce ihtiyaç duyar, biz de yol taşlarına böyle ihtiyaç duyarız. Bundandır ki eski dünyaların peşine düşüp belki başka bir gemidünya keşfederiz umuduyla galaksiyi arşınlamaya mahkûmuz. Her mon-keigh'in yüreğinde bir hayat barınır. Her yol taşı ise bir Asuryan'ın Çocuğu'nun ruhunu muhafaza eder."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
